title: No, Bill Gates hasn’t tweeted wishing Chandra Babu Naidu on his birthday
subtitle: The tweet from Bill Gates wishing Chandra Babu Naidu on his birthday is a fake one.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
Many Facebook users are sharing a post with a tweet alleged to be that of Bill Gates wishing Nara Chandra Babu Naidu on his birthday. Let’s try to analyze the veracity of the tweet enclosed in the post.

Claim: Bill Gates has tweeted wishing Nara Chandra Babu on his birthday. Fact: No such tweet is found on the official twitter page of Bill Gates with the handle “@BillGates”. Even when one searches for such a tweet using twitter’s advanced search, nothing is found. Hence it is a photoshopped post and the claim made in the post is FALSE.

Chandra Babu Naidu celebrated his 69th birthday on April 20, 2019. When one searches the official twitter page of Bill Gates with the handle “@BillGates” regarding wishes to Chandra Babu Naidu on and after Apr 20, 2019, no such tweet was found. There is also no information about the launch of Windows 69 and no such thing was found to have been launched. Bill Gates has last tweeted on April 20, 2019, regarding Melinda Gates new book “#MomentofLift”.

Finally, the tweet from Bill Gates wishing Chandra Babu Naidu on his birthday is a fake one.
